channel.title: Another problem while connecting to irc
channel.description:
Alright I know I already made a thread about problems connecting to the irc, and I would bump it or edit it but it's got a lot of posts in it already and it would only sound like a merciful bump, but since I have a new problem I made a new thread. Well anyways, a timeline: My ISP blocked port 6667 on me, I just finally got them to resolve it for me the other night and I am able to open up the port just fine now. So, here I am thinking yes I'll finally be able to go on the irc again. I go to connect and I get this error message:
* Connecting to irc.moparisthebest.com (6667) - * Unable to connect to server (Connection timed out)
Same goes for:
* Connecting to irc.efak.net (6667) - * Unable to connect to server (Connection timed out)
The error message is very vague, and I haven't been able to find anything about it since it could be a million different things. Here's some more info if it helps: I can connect to just about any other irc server(although some do not work). My identd and dns should be just fine, as I read they are common problems with this error and I tried all the solutions. Also, no other irc client works either. Any insight? Thanks

item.title: Another problem while connecting to irc
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Smegman, post:11, topic:31471”]efak is crap. use irc.3rxnet.org (everyone went there)

i had a problem with my anti virus blocking port 6667… but that couldnt be your problem because other irc servers work[/quote]

Thanks, it works and your right, everyone is in there. That’s great, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Another problem while connecting to irc
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

juju:

Do a tracert on 64.72.114.252 and paste the results here, you’ve proberly got the same issue as I do, which will mean that you’ll have to proxy in.

Microsoft Windows XP [Version 5.1.2600]
(C) Copyright 1985-2001 Microsoft Corp.

C:Documents and SettingsHOME>tracert 64.72.114.252

Tracing route to vhost64-72-114-252.mgmservers.net [64.72.114.252]
over a maximum of 30 hops:

  1     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.2.1
  2    10 ms    10 ms    12 ms  64.230.197.113
  3     9 ms     8 ms     8 ms  dis15-ottawa23_Vlan102.net.bell.ca [64.230.228.4
5]
  4     9 ms     8 ms     8 ms  core1-ottawa23_GE11-0.net.bell.ca [64.230.241.20
9]
  5     9 ms     8 ms     8 ms  core2-ottawatc_POS0-0.net.bell.ca [64.230.228.24
1]
  6    14 ms    14 ms    14 ms  core3-toronto63_POS1-2.net.bell.ca [64.230.204.1
65]
  7    15 ms    14 ms    14 ms  core2-toronto63_POS0-1.net.bell.ca [64.230.242.1
02]
  8    14 ms    14 ms    14 ms  dis40-toronto63-pos4-1-0.in.bellnexxia.net [206.
108.98.142]
  9    14 ms    14 ms    14 ms  mbsmc-fe1-0-0.in.bellnexxia.net [205.207.238.212
]
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11     *

Then basically after the number 11, it just keeps saying Request Timed Out continuously. [br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 06:34:07 PM[/size][hr]Anyone else having this prob?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 01:17:46 PM[/size][hr]When I try using proxies and try to connect to mopar’s irc I get:
Firewall: Connection Refused

I’ve tried a million proxies from various sites and none work. Does anyone know a working proxy for it? What do you use, juju?

Read full topic

@jme wrote:

Alright I know I already made a thread about problems connecting to the irc, and I would bump it or edit it but it’s got a lot of posts in it already and it would only sound like a merciful bump, but since I have a new problem I made a new thread.

Well anyways, a timeline: My ISP blocked port 6667 on me, I just finally got them to resolve it for me the other night and I am able to open up the port just fine now.

So, here I am thinking yes I’ll finally be able to go on the irc again. I go to connect and I get this error message:

* Connecting to irc.moparisthebest.com (6667)

  • Unable to connect to server (Connection timed out)
